revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> '''NPCs''' (or '''non-player characters''') act as helpful guides to the player, giving them information about different features in the game or hinting to the locations and requirements of certain [[Obtainable Pokémon|Pokémon]].
==NPCs by region== <!--T:2-->
===[[Kanto]] NPCs=== <!--T:3-->
<!--T:4--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! NPC Name !! Location !! Function |- | Professor Oak || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Pallet Town]] || Tells the player what is needed to progress to the next [[Regions|region]]. |- | Mom || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Pallet Town]] || Tells the player about the NPCs. |- | Old Man || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Viridian City]] || Teaches the player how to use the [[Pokéballs|Pokéball]] menu. |- | Battle Item Master || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Pewter City]] || Teaches the player about the use of [[Battle Items]]. |- | Gem Scientist || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Pewter City]] || Tells the player about the [[Gems]] usage and how to get. |- | Berry Master || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Cerulean City]] || Gives the player hints about [[Berries|berry]] farming. |- | Super Nerd Jovan || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Cerulean City]] || Tells the player to download saves more frequently. |- | Fan Club Chairman || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Vermilion City]] || Informs the player about Typed [[Eggs]] |- | Shard Apprentice || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Vermilion City]] || Informs the player about [[Shards]] |- | Mr. Fuji || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Lavender Town]] || Informs the player about increased rates of [[Shinies|Shiny Pokémon]] |- | Channeler Karina || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Lavender Town]] || Informs the player about FAQ Menu |- | Battle Item Master 2 || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Saffron City]] || Teaches the player about stacking Battle Items. |- | Breeder || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Saffron City]] || Teaches the player about breeding pokémons. |- | Big Spender || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Celadon City]] || Teaches the player about the [[Shops|Shop]] amount button. |- | Youngster Wendy || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Fuchsia City]] || Informs the player about increased [[Roaming Pokémon]] rates. |- | Researcher || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Cinnabar Island]] || Informs the player about the Roaming nature of Mew. |- | Celio || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|One Island]] || Gives the player the quest to clear the biker from Three Island. |- | Youngster || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|One Island]] || Informs the player about Moltres and make joke about it. |- | Biker || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Three Island]] || After beating the gang, despair of not beeing able to leave the island and wait for the dev to add the others. |}
===[[Johto]] NPCs=== <!--T:5-->
<!--T:6--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! NPC Name !! Location !! Function |- | Professor Elm || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|New Bark Town]] || Tells the player what is needed to progress to the next [[Regions|region]]. |- | Technology Enthusiast || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|New Bark Town]] || Tells the player about [[Dungeons|Dungeon]] Chest mechanics |- | Mr. Pokémon || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Cherrygrove City]] || Teaches the player about the [[Pokemon Day Care|Hatchery]] Queue feature. |- | Earl Dervish || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Violet City]] || Teaches the player about [[Baby Pokémon]]. |- | Wise Old Man || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Azalea Town]] || Tells the player about the [[Ilex Forest|location]] and [[Gyms#Johto_Indigo_Plateau|requirement]] needed to unlock Celebi. |- | Hiker Daniel || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Azalea Town]] || Tells the player about the [[Union Cave|location]] and requirement needed for Lapras to appear. |- | Bill || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Ecruteak City]] || Tells the player the requirements of Espeon and Umbreon. |- | Pokéfan Derek || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Ecruteak City]] || Tells the player that they now have access to the three legendary Beasts. |- | Kimono Girl || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Ecruteak City]] || Tells the player about the [[Tin Tower|location]] and [[Roaming_Pokémon|requirement]] needed to unlock Ho-Oh. |- | Big Spender || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Goldenrod City]] || Teaches the player about the Shop amount button. |- | SS Aqua Captain || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Olivine City]] || Tells the player about the [[Dock]]. |- | Photography Aide || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Cianwood City]] || Tells the player about [[Berries#Wandering_Pokémon|Wandering Pokémon]]. |- | Souvenir Shop Attendant || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Mahogany Town]] || Tells the player about [[Item Magnet]] effects. |- | Pokéfan Trevor || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Blackthorn City]] || Informs the player about increased roamer rates. |}
===[[Hoenn]] NPCs=== <!--T:7-->
<!--T:8--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! NPC Name !! Location !! Function |- | Professor Birch || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Littleroot Town]] || Tells the player what is needed to progress to the next [[Regions|region]]. |- | Professor Birch's Aide || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Littleroot Town]] || Tells the player about updates to the Hatchery Queue. |- | Tracking Scientist || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Oldale Town]] || Tells the player about the Roaming nature of Latios and Latias. |- | Reporter Gabby || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Slateport City]] || Informs the player about increased roamer rates. |- | Professor Cozmo || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Fallarbor Town]] || Informs the player about [[Battle Frontier|Deoxys]]. |- | Weatherman || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Fortree City]] || Informs the player about the several forms of Castform. |- | Pokemon Ranger Catherine || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Fortree City]] || Tells the player about the overuse of the [[Dowsing Machine]]. |- | Astronomer || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Mossdeep City]] || Informs the player about the Roaming nature of Jirachi. |- | Big Spender || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|LilyCove City]] || Teaches the player about Shop amount button. |- | Diver || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Pacifidlog Town]] || Teaches the player about Dungeon Loot rates increasing with clears |- | Gym Leader Wallace || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Sootopolis City]] || Tells the player about the [[Cave of Origin|location]] and [[Gyms#Pokémon League Hoenn|requirement]] needed to unlock Groudon and Kyogre. |}
===[[Sinnoh]] NPCs=== <!--T:9-->
<!--T:10--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! NPC Name !! Location !! Function |- | Contest Champion || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Twinleaf Town]] || Informs the player about the Roaming nature of Mesprit. |- | Professor Rowan || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Sandgem Town]] || Tells the player what is needed to progress to the next [[Regions|region]]. |- | Beachcomber || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Sandgem Town]] || Informs the player about the Roaming nature of Manaphy. |- | Flower Girl || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Floaroma Town]] || Explains the [[Sinnoh#Location-dependent_Pokémon|conditions]] needed to evolve Eevee into Leafeon. |- | Lass Caroline || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Eterna City]] || Informs the player about the [[Old Chateau|location]] and [[Dungeons#Sinnoh|requirement]] for Rotom and its forms. |- | Construction Worker || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Oreburgh City]] || Explains the conditions needed to evolve Nosepass into Probopass. |- | Contest Fan || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Hearthome City]] || Explains the conditions needed to evolve Magneton into Magnezone. |- | Pal Park Warden || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Pal Park]] || Explains the [[Sinnoh#Weather-dependent_Pokémon|conditions]] needed to evolve Cherrim (overcast) into Cherrim (sunny). |- | Riley || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Canalave City]] || Informs the player about the requirement to evolve Riolu. |- | Young Boy || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Canalave City]] || Informs the player about the Roaming nature of Cresselia. |- | Young Girl || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Snowpoint City]] || Explains the conditions needed to evolve Eevee into Glaceon. |- | Ribboner Julia || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Sunyshore City]] || Explains the [[Sinnoh#Level-dependent_Pokémon|conditions]] needed to evolve Pilowswine into Mamoswine. |- | Ace Trainer Quinn || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Fight Area]] || Informs the player about the requirement to unlock [[Distortion World]]. |- | Hiker Kevin || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Survival Area]] || Informs the player about increased roamer rates. |}
===[[Unova]] NPCs=== <!--T:11-->
<!--T:12--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! NPC Name !! Location !! Function |- | Musician || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Castelia City]] || Informs the player about the roaming nature of {{Pokemon|Meloetta}}. |- | Ruin Maniac || [[Relic Castle]] || Informs the player how to get {{Pokemon|Volcarona}} |- | Excited Child || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Humilau City]] || Informs the player about the roaming nature of {{Pokemon|Tornadus}} and {{Pokemon|Thundurus}}. |- | Explorer || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Nimbasa City]] || Informs the player about Mimics and the exclusive mimic in [[Relic Castle]] |- | Fan Club Chairman || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Icirrus City]] || Informs the player about how to obtain [[Black DNA]] and [[White DNA]] |- | Professor Juniper|| [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Nuvema Town]] || Tells the player what is needed to progress to the next [[Regions|region]]. |- | Professor Juniper's Aide || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Nuvema Town]] || Informs the player about increased roamer rates. |- | Colress || [[P2 Laboratory]] || Challenges the player to defeat him to unlock the Rare Pokémon in the lab. |}
===[[Kalos]] NPCs=== <!--T:13-->
<!--T:14--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! NPC Name !! Location !! Function |- | Professor Sycamore || [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Lumiose City]] || Tells the player what is needed to progress to the next [[Regions|region]]. |- | Engineer || [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Lumiose City]] || Informs the player about the [[Kalos Power Plant|location]] and [[Gyms#Pokémon League Kalos|requirement]] for Volcanion |- | Birdwatcher || [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Coumarine City]] || Informs the player about the roaming nature of the legendary birds. |- | Furisode Girl Katherine || [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Laverre City]] || Explains the [[Kalos#Weather-dependent_Pokémon|conditions]] needed to evolve Sliggoo into Goodra. |- | Hex Maniac Melanie || [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Anistar City]] || Informs the player about increased roamer rates. |- | Confused Hiker || [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Kiloude City]] || Informs the player about the roaming nature of Hoopa. |- |}
===[[Alola]] NPCs=== <!--T:15-->
<!--T:16--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! NPC Name !! Location !! Function |- | Scratch Cat Girl || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Iki Town Outskirts]] || Informs the player about the {{Pokemon|Lycanroc (Dusk)}} Requirement |- | Professor Kukui || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Professor Kukui's Lab]] || Informs the player about the missing Pokémon |- | Kahuna Hala || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Iki Town]] || Explains The Trials And Grand Trials |- | Café Owner || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Heahea City]] || Informs the player about The Trials of Akala island and The Kahuna. |- | Actor Meredith || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Paniola Town]] || Informs the player about Oricorio and the berry colors that attracted it in the farm. |- | Kahuna Olivia || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Konikoni City]] || Informs the player about The Alola Pokémon League |- | Aether Branch Chief Wicke || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Aether Paradise]] || Informs the player the Boosted Roamer Rate Route |- | Kahuna Nanu || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Malie City]] || Informs the player of The Requirements To Fight him |- | Worker || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Tapu Village]] || Informs the player about how to evolve {{Pokemon|Crabrawler}} into {{Pokemon|Crabominable}} |- | Captain Mina|| [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Seafolk Village]] || Informs the player of the Requirements of [[Mina's Houseboat]] Dungeon and where the next Kahuna is |- |} </translate>
